title: Rihanna rocks Daisy Dukes as she seductively touches her body in new selfie video
text:
She commanded attention when she posted a sultry slow-motion video of herself walking into frame wearing a beautiful black bikini.

One day later and Rihanna took to Instagram again: this time she flaunted her womanly curves in a pair of Daisy Dukes, along with a frilly, sheer orange top.

She capped off her ensemble for the sexy exhibition in a pair of strapped heels and a heavy dose of natural charisma and attitude.

Exhibition: Rihanna took to her Instagram and shared a quick clip of her rocking Daisy Dukes

In the quick selfie clip, the pop star turned beauty mogul flashed a sultry and seductive look as she stood in what looked to be a large walk-in closet and/or make-up room.

Within seconds, she begins to walk towards the mirror with her gams taking full precedence in her short-shorts.

Just as she comes to a stop for the grand finale, the Barbados native reached down with her right hand and began to touch the area around her zipper and belly-button, oh so gently.

Sexy selfie: The pop superstar also wore a frilly, sheer orange top for her impromptu strut inside what appeared to be a walk-in closet and/or make-up room

The beauty mogul wore her raven tresses long and flowing well past the middle of her back, with major volume and some soft waves

For the seductive strut, the A Girl Like Me singer wore her raven tresses long and flowing well past the middle of her back, with some soft waves.

She also added some major bling in the form of a thick necklace

In the backdrop, there were a number of high-fashion bags, make-up items, accessories and clothing hanging to her right.

Working it: The Barbados native walked towards the mirror with a ton of charisma and attitude

Oh so gently: Just as she comes to a stop for the grand finale, the Barbados native reached down with her right hand and began to touch the area around her zipper and belly-button

Rihanna has sold over 250 million records since her debut in 2005.

But in recent years she has been placing much of her attention into other businesses and ventures.

Her Fenty Beauty launched in 2017 and within a month sales were valued at $72 million. By 2018 those sales soared to more than $573 million.

The brand is best known for its broad inclusivity across skin tones and gender.
description: Rihanna rocked a pair of Daisy Dukes and a sheer orange top as she seductively touched her body during sexy exhibition in a new selfie video on Thursday.
